ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.node
Class NodeBuilder

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.node.NodeBuilder

public class NodeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for building nodes for the style editor tree object.

Author:
Eric Marinier
See Also:
StyleEditorTree
